DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish proportion patient lipid-lowering pharmacological treatment reach LDL-C goal accord NCEP ATP III/updated 2004 NCEP ATP III guideline , overall country , follow sub-populations : - Primary/secondary prevention patient . - Patients metabolic syndrome ( accord NCEP III definition ) . In addition , purpose establish proportion patient lipid-lowering pharmacological treatment reach LDL-C goal accord Third Joint European Task Force guidelines/national guideline , survey population follow sub-populations : - Primary/secondary prevention patient . - Patients metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Centralized Pan-Middle East Survey Undertreatment Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: On lipidlowering drug treatment least 3 month , dose change minimum 6 week . Â· Subject must sign informed consent Subjects unwilling unable provide inform consent .
